name: Mushy Foray
description:
It's 2032. You are a NeoGatherer, a person whose life's dynamics is shapped around going into both the wild and used-to-be human settlements primarily in search of ...

You only have your carrier bag with you, where you place that which is (or may be) relevant to you.

Right now you are in front of a Tori, in a forest you have never been before. And today you have decided to forage for mushrooms!
